name: SESE Python Users Group
tagline: A repository to discuss and share codes for Python users and learners at the School of Earth and Space Exploration, Arizona State University
body:
### Welcome to the SESE Python Users Group
This group was created as a discussion and sharing platform for Python users and learners at the School of Earth and Space Exploration (SESE), Arizona State University. We use GitHub Organization platform due to its integration of user management, version control, and discussion platform via issue tracking.

### Admins
Piyanat (Boom) Kittiwisit (@piyanatk)
Abhi Rajan (@abhijithrajan)
Kimberly Ward-Duong (@spacegal-spiff)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
